properties.areaDesc: Flaming Gorge; East Sweetwater County; Rock Springs and Green River
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 2 at 9:13AM MST until February 4 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Riverton WY
properties.description:
...Major Winter Storm is expected this Afternoon through Monday
Night...

.A cold front move into northern Wyoming by noon. This cold front
will drop southward to the Continental Divide by around sunset,
and then move into southwest Wyoming tonight. The snow is expected
to occur in the north this afternoon and progress south tonight.
This storm system will impact most areas through Monday evening,
then taper off late Monday night. The heaviest snowfall looks to
occur tonight through Monday afternoon.

* WHAT...Moderate snow.

* WHERE...Rock Springs and Green River, Flaming Gorge and East
Sweetwater County.

* WHEN...From 2 AM Monday to 5 AM MST Tuesday.

* SNOW AMOUNTS...3 to 6 inches with locally higher amounts
possible.

* IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to nearly impossible
Monday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Northeast wind of 25 to 35 mph with
higher gusts on Monday may cause blizzard conditions at times.
Expect much blowing and drifting snow.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM MONDAY TO 5 AM MST TUESDAY
